forum.content:
Are you. lonesome . tonight .？
Do. you miss me
tonight .?
Are. you. sorry. we
drifted apart ?
Does your. memory stretch to
a. bright summer
day。
When l. kissed. you and. called
you. sweet~heart ?
Tell me. dear. ~~~
Are. you. lone~some. tonight
?
forum.title: 標題；Are you. lonesome  tonight
